headline.main: BRITISH BOMBERS STRIKE AT CRETE; Pound Axis Bases at Candia and Suda Bay, Extending Middle East Offensive

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Oct. 31-- Returning again to the scene of the air battles of Crete that went against the British last Spring, strong forces of British bombers blasted Candia and the Suda Bay area Wednesday night through stormy weather, the Middle East Command reported today.
abstract: RAF bombs Candia and Suda Bay areas, Crete; hits Tripoli and Bardia, Libya; South African planes bomb objectives behind Axis lines; Axis planes and artillery pound Tobruk

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
